attributes.action: grant tax relief on private medical and dental insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who have private medical and dental treatment save the NHS billions of pounds every year, money which can then be used to help those who cannot afford private insurance.  By giving tax relief on private insurance more people will be able to join such schemes and save the NHS more money than the tax revenue lost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
